roleset.name: obstruct or delay (legislation)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ... they 're ready to stand up to the Republican majority and may even filibuster the president 's latest Supreme Court pick Samuel Alito a move that would make these events seem liek the opening fireworks in a much nastier battle .

propbank.arg: the president 's latest Supreme Court pick Samuel Alito
a move that would make these events seem liek the opening fireworks in a much nastier battle

roleset.note: FILIBUSTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'filibuster' based on ebc. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'obsrtuct' and 'stymie'. (from filibuster.01-v predicate notes)
